RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Abandoned child
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME was born sickly. Thinking that HE would only burden the tribe, HIS parents left HIM out in the elements. Somehow, HE survived.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Reclusive child
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME didn’t learn to speak until HE was nearly 5 years old, and, even then, HE preferred to keep to HIMself. When HE was in HIS early teens, HE made a habit of wandering off from the village to live in the wilderness for weeks at a time.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Herder
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: As a child, NAME tended the tribe’s muffalo herds, keeping them safe from predators and treating the sick. It was quiet work, but HE enjoyed being away from people.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Scavenger
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME spent HIS childhood escaping grunt work to go digging through wrecks and ruins for treasures. HISCAP natural curiosity got HIM into a lot of trouble, but it also yielded many interesting finds.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Cave child
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME grew up in a large and intricate cave complex that extended deep into a mountainside. HECAP helped the adults maintain and improve the deep caves.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Sole survivor
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME’s entire tribe was wiped out in a raid. Though HE was adopted by another group, HE was emotionally scarred, and preferred to stay near home, cooking and tending crops.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Vengeful child
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: As a child, NAME returned to HIS village to find that it had been wiped out by bandits. HECAP swore revenge on the attackers and began a violent rampage across the wilderness.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Fire keeper
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME was responsible for keeping the tribe’s fire going. HECAP took this responsibility very seriously.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Healer
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: After HIS tribe’s elder healer was killed in a raid, NAME took on the role. HECAP spent HIS days scrounging up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Scout
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: Since HIS tribe has made contact with local outlanders, NAME has contracted HIS services out as a guide to the local area. Frequent contact with ancient relics has made HIM fairly comfortable with the old technology.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Digger
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME and HIS tribe carved their home deep into the side of a mountain. NAME feels most at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Muffalo shaman
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: Because of HIS quiet wisdom and great strength, NAME became the spiritual leader for a nomadic tribe that followed the herds of roaming muffalo.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Lore keeper
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME was one of a long line of lore keepers in HIS tribe. Every night around the fire, HECAP would pass on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Weaver
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME was an expert at working muffalo wool, plant fibres and natural dyes into beautiful clothing for HIS kin. HISCAP beautiful handicrafts were traded frequently between local tribes.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Cave tender
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: While the others were out hunting and foraging, NAME would stay at home to cook and take care of the young and sick.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Warrior
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME was a fearsome warrior, proficient with many weapons. HECAP participated in many battles.
